subsection.name: About the DPML
subsection.p: OSM is affiliated with The Digital Product Meta Library (DPML) - an open community project developing advanced Java-based component management solutions.
The DPML codebase is available to the public with content published under the commercially friendly Apache 2.0 License.

subsection.name: About Ibiblio
subsection.p: Ibiblio is home to one of the largest "collections of collections" on the Internet, ibiblio.org is a conservancy of freely available information, including software, music, literature, art, history, science, politics, and cultural studies and host to the OSM collection of component resources and training material.
